admin1.text: I have an issue with my account login. Can you assist me?
I'd be happy to help. Can you please provide me with the error message you're seeing when you try to log in?

admin3.text: I’ve been using your platform for a while now, and I really like it! I just wanted to ask if you have plans to add any new features soon?

Hi! Thanks for the feedback, and we’re thrilled you like the platform! Yes, we have some exciting features in the pipeline, including real-time collaboration and enhanced reporting tools. We're always working on improving the platform to better serve our users.
That sounds fantastic! Is there a timeline for when those features will be available?
